sentences: Daniel Seagrave (born 1970) is a British artist, who created many record covers for death metal bands especially in the early 1990s.
He lives in Toronto, Ontario, Canada.
He grew up in Ravenshead, near Nottingham.
Seagrave's works are typically highly detailed.
He also works on mural designs and sells his art as posters.
